text: The 1956–57 WHL season was the fifth season of the Western Hockey League. The Brandon Regals were the President's Cup champions as they beat the New Westminster Royals in four games in the final series. == Final Standings == {| class="wikitable sortable" |+Coast Division Standings1956-57 Western Hockey League Standings !
